pages.text: $(l:mobs/witch)Witches$() like to live alone, only with their black $(l:mobs/cat)cat$(). They do this in small wooden sheds, called witch huts. Witch huts always contain a $(l:blocks/cauldron)cauldron$(), a $(l:blocks/crafting_table)crafting table$() and a $(l:blocks/flower_pot)flower pot$() with a $(l:blocks/mushroom)mushroom$() or sapling inside.
